name: Candy Steal
description:
Version: 0.1 (10-29-2020) (ALL OF THIS INFO IS INCLUDED IN THE ZIP FILE)

Hello, and thank you for downloading my game.

To play, select a song and click on it.

Each song has its own set of candy,

One candy is the left click candy, requiring you to left click to steal the candy.

The other candy is the right click candy, which must be right clicked to be stolen.

The less time you take, the more points you will earn.

Try to earn as many points as you can during the song.

And that's about it! Thanks for playing!

-Moksha, Creator

  • MONSTER MASH:
      Left Click: Orange Candy
      Right Click: Peppermint
  • SPOOKY SCARY SKELETONS: 
      Left Click: Green Candy
      Right Click: Chocolate
